name: places/ChIJw0aZhxdZwokRYbJ9Nqt_76U
formattedAddress: 462 W 42nd St, New York, NY 10036, USA
adrFormatAddress: 462 W 42nd St, New York, NY 10036, USA

editorialSummary.text: Store offering shipping, packaging, printing & other services, plus office supplies.

originalText.text:
Don’t come here if you need a label printed. Charge you money to use the computer, charge you for each item printed, expect you to log into your own personal email account.

In response to their reply: It’s pretty standard for shipping shops to allow you to print a label by emailing it to them for less than 50 cents or so. UPS store up near 86 and Columbus for example, ended up going there instead.

originalText.text: Hello. I was picking up my package from urban outfitters on Nov 6th, 2023 at 12:10pm at the UPS store on 462 w 42nd st, which serves as their collection point. I have used this service previously without any hiccups, but this time it took a while for the employee to believe that they even had my package or that I would ship it directly to the store before they finally checked the tracking number and easily placed it. Afterward, I was told to pay a $7 storage fee, which puzzled me since UO should’ve obviously covered that cost. After mentioning this to the employee, I was told that they weren’t aware of what was going on and that the storage fee was always a thing. And only after paying the fee and having left the store I saw that there was a big sticker slip on the package with a bold black number 3001 on it that said that my package was delivered and my storage fee was waived. I’m a little upset that I didn’t notice it sooner and that the employee failed to mention that, but that is obviously because they haven’t been informed of this, and the UPS software most likely failed to mention that under my order. I have no issue with the order or the employee, but I do not want to use the service of picking up my package at this UPS collection point again and fear encountering the same problem. I hope this feedback is enough not to blame the employee and ensure the client files are regularly updated on the computer.

originalText.text:
Anthony goes beyond his duties to make any customer feel appreciated and does it in a respectful way. With much confusion and frustration Anthony was able to help me pick out the right box, package it correctly and best of all put it all together.

I've never encountered a UPS employee like Ant. Highly suitable for a raise and promotion!

Thank you!! Will be back here indefinitely.

originalText.text:
Crazy expensive to print out a few pieces of paper.

Note that when you extend your session you are paying $2 per extension (no warning given about this charge when you’re extending the session).

Wound up paying more than $10 for 3 pieces of paper because the margins were messed up and I couldn’t preview my page to ensure the correct print.

originalText.text:
Great convenient location.
The UPS team Yamin is amazing. She's efficient, she takes care of every customer, She's an excellent multitasker, so you'll never have to wait long to drop off a package at the front desk.
